This class logically represents the classic game mode.

GameHouseRules - Class in model.house_rules

GameHouseRules(Stats, Sound) - Constructor for class model.house_rules.GameHouseRules
Constructs a gameHouseRules object
gameLoop() - Method in class model.classic.GameClassic
manages all the possible game dynamics - check if and who won the game - manages player turns - manages the drawing of cards - plays sound effects in the appropriate case - check if player said UNO correctly - handles the dynamic of doubt with wildcards +4 It communicates them to the view with the observer pattern.
gameLoop() - Method in class model.deadly.GameDeadly
manages all the possible game dynamics - check if and who won the game - manages player turns and eliminations - manages the drawing (not single) of cards - plays sound effects in the appropriate case It communicates them to the view with the observer pattern.
gameLoop() - Method in class model.Game
 
gameLoop() - Method in class model.house_rules.GameHouseRules
manages all the possible game dynamics - check if and who won the game - manages player turns - manages the drawing of cards (check if the +4 and +2 cards are combined) - plays sound effects in the appropriate case - check if player said UNO correctly It communicates them to the view with the observer pattern.
generateFilePath(int, char) - Method in class view.Panel
based on the number and color of the default Card it generates a filepath for it,
generateFilePathSpecial(Type, char) - Method in class view.Panel
based on the Type and color of the Special Card (+2, reverse, skip, wildCard, wildCard+4) it generates a filepath for it,
